channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Vivo V60 Captures Flagship Level Portraits At A Mid-Range Price
item.description: The V60 features a pair of Zeiss-branded 50-megapixel cameras that can capture portraits at various popular focal lengths.

item.title: Microsoft’s Free Windows Offer Deadline—Now Just 7 Weeks Away
item.description: You have 49 days to act — do not leave it too late.

item.title: Nvidia Bets Big On Optics
item.description: Nvidia’s going all-in on optical networking—1.6 Tb/s per port switches coming next year, pushing toward 12.8 Tbps. Broadcom, AMD, IBM joins.

item.title: Rokid Glasses Brings ChatGPT, Camera And Display In Discreet Form
item.description: The Rokid Glasses are the most feature-packed and sleek looking smartglasses I’ve tested yet.

item.title: How Agentic AI Could Finally Streamline The Overworked SOC
item.description: Agentic AI is transforming SOCs by triaging alerts, reducing analyst burnout, and enabling faster, smarter security operations at scale.

item.title: Mirrors and hats
item.description: No one buys a hat without looking at themselves in a mirror first. Ever. There were hats before there were mirrors, so I’m not sure how it used to be,...

item.title: Job churn
item.description: Since I was born, humans have created 6 billion jobs. All while technology relentlessly disrupts existing industries. The pin making machine replaced ...

item.title: “GET OUTTA MY WAY”
item.description: Pedestrian traffic in Grand Central Station is a bit of a miracle. Thousands of people, all walking quickly, in almost non-Euclidian chaos, headed tow...

item.title: Aha!
item.description: Teaching is not about assignments, textbooks or authority. It’s about the pedagogy, connection and approach that creates the conditions for a willing ...

item.title: Centering
item.description: Conversations and projects usually revolve around an axis. It could be a goal or an urgency or a person. It might be the boss. Wondering what they wan...
